Detailed Description

Main function that will start the node path_follow_draw_path. This node will have 3 threads for multiple processes.

ROS init that will create node path_follow_draw_path

NodeHandle is the main access point to communications with the ROS system. The first NodeHandle constructed will fully initialize this node, and the last NodeHandle destructed will close down the node.

Let's start seperate thread first, to do that we need to create object and thereafter start the thread on teh function desired

< Create Shared Pointer

< Create Thread one that will receive the send poses

< Create Thread two that will print the path ana analyse the point status

< Create Thread three that will allow the robot to navigate to multiple locations

ros::spin() will enter a loop, pumping callbacks. With this version, all callbacks will be called from within this thread (the main one). ros::spin() will exit when Ctrl-C is pressed, or the node is shutdown by the master.

Let's cleanup everything, shutdown ros and join the thread
